segments.text: Oh no, this scene is just full of potential accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and the woman is just standing there, not noticing a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and they're going to get into so much trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, and it's just asking for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so scared that someone is going to get hurt in all this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should be more aware of her surroundings and take control of the situation before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she's still drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this kind of negligence, it's just not right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to slip on that wet floor and really hurt themselves, and it's all going to be her fault.
segments.speaker: PAR
